scripts.build: next build && next export && mv out/_next out/next && sed -i '' -e 's/\/_next/\.\/next/g' out/**.html && mv out/index.html ../extension/preferences.html && rsync -va --delete-after out/next/ ../extension/next/ && rm -rf out
scripts.build:linux: next build && next export && mv out/_next out/next && sed -i 's/\/_next/\.\/next/g' out/**.html && mv out/index.html ../extension/preferences.html && rsync -va --delete-after out/next/ ../extension/next/ && rm -rf out
